messages.text: 目前尚有下列設備未歸還：{{66.text}}

__IMTCONN__.label: My LINE (Message API) connection (北榮設備借用小幫手)

nested.help:
◉ `Cover`: The image fills the entire image area. Parts of the image that do not fit in the area are not displayed.
◉`Contain`: The entire image is displayed in the image area. A background is displayed in the unused areas to the left and right of vertical images and in the areas above and below horizontal images.

mapper.prompt:
You are an image analizer, clearly explain the content of the image you see
Always summarize in  #zh-tw 
你是一個圖像分析師，使用者會提供想借用設備的照片，你必須從圖片中擷取出使用者想借的設備是甚麼，並且只說出該設備名稱，不須包含任何標點符號。可能的設備如下：筆記型電腦、相機、喇叭、鍵盤、滑鼠

spec.name: imageUploadType
spec.label: How would you like to specify an image?

nested.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

mappable.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.

nested.help: Binary data of the image. For example, you can retrieve the binary data of your image using the __HTTP: Get a file__ module.
nested.name: imageFileData
nested.label: Image File

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

messages.text:
本聊天機器人具有下列功能
1.上傳設備照片幫您登記借用或查詢紀錄並歸還。提醒您，目前官方帳號尚無上傳照片功能，您可以把我加入聊天群組中，即可讓我幫您解析照片囉。
2.輸入「借」+「設備」，便自動幫您登記設備借用紀錄。
3.輸入「還」+「設備」，便自動幫您註記歸還
4.點選下方選單「個人借用中設備」或輸入「狀態查詢」，可查詢目前借用中設備。
5.點選下方選單或輸入「使用說明」，可顯示本段說明。

__IMTCONN__.label: My LINE (Message API) connection (北榮設備借用小幫手)
